column5: Prime Downtown Moody Heights Houston Location: Elegant 1 bedroom, 1 bath w/yard. Electric gate & full home security system with parking for 5. Outside patio for entertaining with hammock, stainless steel appliances, hardwood flooring, granite counter tops throughout, large walk-in closet, ten foot ceilings, Fullsize Washer & Dryer. 1 mile to Downtown Houston with multiple bike trails nearby. Less than four miles from Houston's Museum District.
